Ah <S%H1945><s%> sinful <S%H2398><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> loaded <S%H3515><s%> with iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> a seed <S%H2233><s%> of evildoers, <S%H7489><s%> children <S%H2233><s%> who deal corruptly! <S%H7843><s%> They have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> They have despised <S%H5006><s%> the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> They are estranged <S%H2114><s%> and backward. <S%H268><s%>

Why should you be beaten <S%H5221><s%> more, <S%H5627><s%> that you revolt more and more? <S%H3254><s%> The whole head <S%H7218><s%> is sick, <S%H2483><s%> and the whole heart <S%H3824><s%> faint. <S%H1742><s%>

From the sole <S%H3709><s%> of the foot <S%H7272><s%> even to the head <S%H7218><s%> there is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in it: <S%H6482><s%> wounds, welts, <S%H2250><s%> and open <S%H2961><s%> sores. <S%H4347><s%> They haven't <S%H2115><s%> been closed, neither bandaged, <S%H2280><s%> neither soothed <S%H7401><s%> with oil. <S%H8081><s%>

Your country <S%H776><s%> is desolate. <S%H8077><s%> Your cities <S%H5892><s%> are burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%> Strangers <S%H2114><s%> devour <S%H398><s%> your land <S%H127><s%> in your presence, <S%H8077><s%> and it is desolate, as overthrown <S%H4114><s%> by strangers. <S%H2114><s%>

The daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> is left <S%H3498><s%> like a shelter <S%H5521><s%> in a vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> like a hut <S%H4412><s%> in a field of melons, <S%H4750><s%> like a besieged <S%H5341><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

Unless <S%H3884><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies <S%H6635><s%> had left <S%H3498><s%> to us a very small <S%H4592><s%> remnant, <S%H8300><s%> we would have been <S%H1961><s%> as Sodom; <S%H5467><s%> we would have been like <S%H1819><s%> Gomorrah. <S%H6017><s%>

"What <S%H4100><s%> are the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> to me? <S%H559><s%>," says Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> "I have had enough <S%H7646><s%> of the burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> and the fat <S%H2459><s%> of fed animals. <S%H4806><s%> I don't <S%H2654><s%> delight in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of bulls, <S%H6499><s%> or of lambs, <S%H3532><s%> or of male goats. <S%H6260><s%>
When you come <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H1245><s%> who has required this at your hand, <S%H3027><s%> to trample <S%H7429><s%> my courts? <S%H2691><s%>

Bring <S%H935><s%> no more <S%H3254><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> offerings. <S%H4503><s%> Incense <S%H7004><s%> is an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to me; <S%H2320><s%> new moons, Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and convocations: <S%H4744><s%> I can't <S%H3201><s%> bear with <S%H3201><s%> evil <S%H205><s%> assemblies. <S%H4744><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> hates <S%H8130><s%> your New Moons <S%H2320><s%> and your appointed feasts. <S%H4150><s%> They are a burden <S%H2960><s%> to me. <S%H3811><s%> I am weary of bearing them. <S%H5375><s%>

When you spread forth <S%H6566><s%> your hands, <S%H3709><s%> I will hide <S%H5956><s%> my eyes <S%H5869><s%> from you. <S%H7235><s%> Yes, when you make many prayers, <S%H8605><s%> I will not hear. <S%H8085><s%> Your hands <S%H3027><s%> are full <S%H4390><s%> of blood. <S%H1818><s%>

Wash <S%H7364><s%> yourselves, <S%H2135><s%> make yourself clean. Put away <S%H5493><s%> the evil <S%H7455><s%> of your doings <S%H4611><s%> from before <S%H5048><s%> my eyes. <S%H5869><s%> Cease <S%H2308><s%> to do evil. <S%H7489><s%>

Learn <S%H3925><s%> to do well. <S%H3190><s%> Seek <S%H1875><s%> justice. <S%H4941><s%> Relieve <S%H833><s%> the oppressed. <S%H2541><s%> Judge <S%H8199><s%> the fatherless. <S%H3490><s%> Plead <S%H7378><s%> for the widow. <S%H490><s%>"

"Come now, <S%H3212><s%> and let us reason together, <S%H3198><s%>" says <S%H559><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> "Though your sins <S%H2399><s%> be as scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> they shall be as white <S%H3835><s%> as snow. <S%H7950><s%> Though they be red <S%H119><s%> like crimson, <S%H8438><s%> they shall be as wool. <S%H6785><s%>
If you are willing <S%H14><s%> and obedient, <S%H8085><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of the land; <S%H776><s%>

but if you refuse <S%H3985><s%> and rebel, <S%H4784><s%> you shall be devoured <S%H398><s%> with the sword; <S%H2719><s%> for the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken it. <S%H1696><s%>"

How the faithful <S%H539><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> has become a prostitute! <S%H2181><s%> She was full <S%H4392><s%> of justice; <S%H4941><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%> lodged <S%H3885><s%> in her, <S%H7523><s%> but now murderers.
Your silver <S%H3701><s%> has become dross, <S%H5509><s%> your wine <S%H5435><s%> mixed <S%H4107><s%> with water. <S%H4325><s%>

Your princes <S%H8269><s%> are rebellious, <S%H5637><s%> and companions <S%H2270><s%> of thieves. <S%H1590><s%> Everyone loves <S%H157><s%> bribes, <S%H7810><s%> and follows <S%H7291><s%> after rewards. <S%H8021><s%> They don't <S%H8199><s%> judge the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> neither does the cause <S%H7379><s%> of the widow <S%H490><s%> come to them. <S%H935><s%>

Therefore the Lord, <S%H113><s%> Yahweh <S%H113><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> the Mighty One <S%H46><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> says: <S%H5002><s%> "Ah, <S%H1945><s%> I will get relief <S%H5162><s%> from my adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and avenge <S%H5358><s%> myself of my enemies; <S%H341><s%>
and I will turn <S%H7725><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> on you, <S%H1253><s%> thoroughly purge away <S%H6884><s%> your dross, <S%H5509><s%> and will take away <S%H5493><s%> all your tin. <S%H913><s%>
